column4: I'm having a problem with gksudo.  sudo works.  when I try gksudo it gives my this error in the terminal: Error copying '/home/myusername/.Xauthority' to '/tmp/libgksu-sZhYXt': Permission denied
the gksudo problem only started after upgrading from dapper to edgy
try removing those 2 files and restart x
wouldn't removing my Xauthority file be problematic?  I guess I can just make a backup in case something goes wrong
